Articles.Content: Hello everyone. I am no stranger to Kerbal Space Program. I have been playing since 0.17 so I know my way around the sky. But I am no pro thats for sure. I've never gone farther then Eve or Duna and I still have yet to master docking in orbit but I am new here to the forum and ready to learn all that I can. And to be an active member here on the fourm.

Welcome to the community BaconByte

It's always good to see another player join the forums, you'll find a lot of help her on docking and deep space missions, so take a look around
Thank you and glad to be here.
Welcome and have fun. The tutorials area might have some good tutorials on how to dock.
